applyTo: "**/*.cs"
---

- All C# classes, constructors, properties, fields, and methods must have XML documentation comments.
- Follow existing coding styles and patterns in the project.
- Do not change formatting or indentation styles.
- Do not modify code unrelated to your task.
- All C# files should use CRLF line endings.
- Ensure all new code is thoroughly tested with unit tests.
